body.p: The import/export operations are located in the Options menu. These operations allow you to load or save global preferences as an XML file. You can use this file to reload saved options both on your computer and on others.

The import/export buttons are located in the preferences page of the . To open this page, go to
oXygen XML Editor . You can use the import/export buttons to load or save global preferences as an XML file which can be reloaded both on your computer and on others.

The following actions are available in the Options menu:
Reset Global Options
Restores the preferences to the factory defaults.
Restores the preference to the factory defaults, or to the custom defaults, if they are defined.
Import Global Options Allows you to import a set ofGlobal Options from an options file options file;
Export Global Options Allows you to export the entire set ofGlobal Options to an options file.
